wikipedia_page.main: Surgeon Major Thomas Egerton Hale VC CB (24 September 1832 – 25 December 1909) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: *Thomas Egerton Hale VC CB (1832 in Nantwich – 1909), recipient of the Victoria CrossObituary in the British Medical Journal, 1910 Jan 1, Surgeon-Major Thomas Egerton Hale, VC, CB, MD retrieved January 2018.
